1.title: Alex
1.plot: Alex, 26, is a violent criminal and a prostitute. Combined with her addiction to crack and heroin, she is rapidly spiraling out of control. Fearing for her safety, her large family has banded together in hopes of saving her life.

2.title: Sahara
2.plot: Sahara, 23, lives a life of crime. Fast money comes easy when you're a professional thief, but keeping it is hard when you're addicted to meth. As Sahara falls deeper into the criminal underworld, her family fears for her life. Will she accept help?

3.title: Pierce
3.plot: Pierce, 26, is a self-proclaimed "grifter", who regularly engages in conning and petty theft to support his meth habit. Pierce's addiction has taken a tremendous toll on his family and now it's time for them to intervene. Will Pierce accept their plea?

4.title: Sarah
4.plot: Sarah is a 27-year-old call girl who sells her body in order to fund a lavish lifestyle. With a growing rap sheet and a disregard for her own safety, Sarah's friends fear that she will end up in prison or worse. Can Sarah get help before it's too late?

5.title: Ikaika
5.plot: Ikaika, a gifted 23-year-old hustler from Oakland, California, sells bootlegged DVDs and pimps out his live-in girlfriend. With the help of his family and an Interventionist, he will be presented with a chance to leave his criminal past behind him.

7.title: Chris
7.plot: Chris is a 44-year-old heroin dealer with a big rap sheet living in rural Pennsylvania and dealing in urban Detroit where his loving family wants him to stop.

8.title: Bianca
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: Mandy
9.plot: Mandy, a prostitute in Maryland, services up to ten clients a day to feed her heroine addiction. With her drug habit becoming more intense, it motivates her to steal from those who love her the most -- her family. Will they get Mandy help, or turn her in?

10.title: Katie and Corey
10.plot: Katie and Corey, a young couple with a 4-year-old son, shoplift, rob, and deal drugs to feed their heroin and meth addictions. Will their family and friends be able to save them from the brink?

-1.title: Cheryl
-1.plot: Cheryl, 27, is an aspiring model - and a gang member. Her family has repeatedly urged her to leave the gang life behind, but Cheryl refuses. With nowhere else to turn, her family enlists a team of interventionists to help lead her in the right direction.

imdb.plot outline: Families across the nation are on the brink of destruction as their lives have been hijacked by a criminal loved one... this is their BREAKING POINT. This reality series features subjects who believe they are participating in a documentary about their life of crime. What they don't know is they will soon face a criminal intervention that offers only two choices: accept treatment or face the possibility of prison time. Each surprise criminal intervention is conducted by top criminal defense attorney and certified intervention professional, Darren Kavinoky, whose insights into illegal behavior are based not only in professional clinical interest - but, also his passion, borne of personal experience fighting his own addictions to drugs and alcohol, and committing crimes that led him to handcuffs, himself. Told in gripping verite-style, these are the stories of lost souls who walk life's tightrope, edging closer and closer to a great fall, while dragging their loved ones down with them. Through BREAKING POINT, criminals and their families confront their darkest demons with the hope of finally finding a road to redemption. Each episode follows real criminals through their daily lives and starkly reveals the devastation their behavior has brought to themselves, their families and friends. The Criminal Interventionist enters to lend his authentic viewpoint stemming from his own personal experience, which could have led him to the same untimely end awaiting those who cannot, or will not, recover. Kavinoky and the extensive BREAKING POINT team have made it their mission to stop the madness that can lead only to jails, institutions, or death and MadJack Entertainment captures it all for us to witness on BREAKING POINT.
imdb.title: Breaking Point
plot: Families across the nation are on the brink of destruction as their lives have been hijacked by a criminal loved one... this is their BREAKING POINT. Kavinoky and the extensive BREAKING POINT team have made it their mission to stop the madness that can lead only to jails, institutions, or death and MadJack Entertainment captures it all for us to witness on BREAKING POINT.

In the premiere episode, Alex, 26, has two different identities: "Bang$," a violent criminal and "Bella," a money-hungry prostitute. Combined with her addiction to crack and heroin, Alex is rapidly spiraling out of control. From robbery to kidnapping, there's little she won't do. Fearing for her safety, her large Italian-American family has banded together in hopes of saving her life.
